A group of people walked over the Bering Land Bridge to North America

* [Beringia](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Beringia) is another name for the Bering Land Bridge
- ![Beringia](http://www.athropolis.com/arctic-facts/maps/land-bridge.gif)
- It happened a really long time ago (~10000 years?)
* Some archeologists call them the [Clovis People](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Clovis_culture)
